content: diamond baby blanket the perfect baby blanket with a simple memorable pattern and a reversible finished projekt **yarn ** shown sample knitted with cotton 8/8 julie from falk garn 85m 93yds /50g colorway greige you can use any other yarn with same yarn weight aran or any other yarn weight and adjust pattern **needles ** 4 mm/us 6 40cm/16 long circular needles **gauge ** 18 stitches x 25 row for 10x10 cm / 4 in pattern after blocking gauge is not important for fit but can affect yardage **finished size ** 87cm/34 long and 59cm/23 wide measurements after blocking **yardage ** 480m/525yds but adjustable if you have smaller/larger skeins **tools ** tapestry needle for weaving in ends mats for blocking
